ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcvexch.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |

| 4 |  | lcvexch.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |

| 7 |  | lcvexch.r | |- ( ph -> R e. S ) |
| 8 |  | lcvexch.a | |- ( ph -> ( T i^i U ) C_ R ) |
| 9 |  | lcvexch.b | |- ( ph -> R C_ U ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_lsssssubg | |- ( W e. LMod -> S C_ ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |

| 12 | 11, 7 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |

| 14 | 11, 6 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 15 | 2 | #P_lsmmod | |- ( ( ( R e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) /\ R C_ U ) -> ( R .(+) ( T i^i U ) ) = ( ( R .(+) T ) i^i U ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 13, 14, 9, 15 | #P_syl31anc | |- ( ph -> ( R .(+) ( T i^i U ) ) = ( ( R .(+) T ) i^i U ) ) |
| 17 | 1 | #P_lssincl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ T e. S /\ U e. S ) -> ( T i^i U ) e. S ) |
| 18 | 4, 5, 6, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( T i^i U ) e. S ) |
| 19 | 11, 18 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ph -> ( T i^i U ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 20 | 2 | #P_lsmss2 | |- ( ( R e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ ( T i^i U ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ ( T i^i U ) C_ R ) -> ( R .(+) ( T i^i U ) ) = R ) |
| 21 | 12, 19, 8, 20 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( R .(+) ( T i^i U ) ) = R ) |
| 22 | 16, 21 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( R .(+) T ) i^i U ) = R ) |
